devdoc.author: Cooper Labs
devdoc.details: Silo Vaults v2 is a ERC4626 that do not have an initial 1:1 shares-to-assets rate with underlying markets but 1e18 shares = 1 underlying asset.This adapter is used to allow MorphoChainlinkOracleV2 to get the assets value of Silo Vaults v2 rounded down.

params.shares: The number of shares to convert in 1e18.

returns._0: The number of assets in 1e18 from silo vault.

devdoc.title: SiloVaultsMorphoAdapter

convertToAssets(uint256).notice: Convert shares to assets and apply the silo decimals offset.

userdoc.notice: Adapter of Silo Vaults for MorphoChainlinkOracleV2.
